page.title: 10SKIPSEA YOUTH CLUB
page.content: On Friday nights, we arrive at the Village Hall. There are 2 pool tables and 1 snooker table. We sign our names on a tick list to decide the order of play. We play darts on the stage where it is safer.We also get out the table tennis table sometimes.The tuck shop opens. It sells whispers (chocolates) jawbreaks ,bubble-gum and varieties of pop. Jim operates the shop. We have a disco unit with a mike. Duncan Barriskell usually operates the disco. Children bring their own records from the top ten.About 30_40 children come to Youth Club .Sometimes we clear away at 9:00 and have games of soccer and volleyball with a big sponge ball.We finish at 10:00. Sometimes we meet at the playing field to play soccer, cricket and rounders. By Bruce Barriskell and Robert Shepherdson.
